00009 #ifdef OODEBUG
00010 #define OOTrace OOVerify
00011 #endif
00012 
00013 static struct {
00014     char actual[1024*1024];
00015     const char *aptr;
00016     int line;
00017 } adata;
00018 
00019 //#define OODEBUG_EXPECT
00020 
00021 void OOVerify( NSString *fmt, ... ) {
00022     va_list argp;
00023     va_start(argp, fmt);
00024     if ( adata.aptr ) {
00025 #ifdef OODEBUG_EXPECT
00026         NSString *log = [[NSString alloc] initWithFormat:fmt arguments:argp];
00027 #else
00028         NSString *log = nil;
00029 #endif
00030         void *instance = va_arg( argp, void * );
00031         const char *action = va_arg( argp, const char * );
00032         if ( log ) {
00033             printf( "0x%08x %-10s - %s\n", (unsigned int)instance, action, [log UTF8String] );
00034             [log release];
00035         }
00036         if ( strncmp( action, adata.aptr, strlen( action ) ) != 0 ) {
00037             printf( "*** ACTION: %s, expected %s, line %d\n", action, adata.aptr, adata.line );
00038             if ( adata.actual[0] ) strcat( adata.actual, " " );
00039             strcat( adata.actual, action );
00040         }
00041         else if ( *(adata.aptr += strlen( action )) )
00042                 adata.aptr++;
00043     }
00044     va_end( argp );
00045 }
00046 
00047 #define OOExpect( _actions ) _OOExpect( _actions, __LINE__ )
00048 
00049 static void _OOExpect( const char *actions, int line ) {
00050     if ( adata.aptr && *adata.aptr )
00051         printf( "*** Remainder: %s, line %d\n", adata.aptr, adata.line );
00052     if ( adata.actual[0] ) {
00053         printf( "*** Unexpected: OOExpect( \"%s\" );, line %d\n", adata.actual, adata.line );
00054         adata.actual[0] = '\000';
00055     }
00056     adata.aptr = actions;
00057     adata.line = line;
00058 }
00059 
00060 /**
00061  A test class to check objects in C++ NSValue wrapper classes are recovered properly.
00062  */
00063 
00064 static int constructed;
00065 
00066 class OOClassTest {
00067 public:
00068     OOClassTest() { constructed++; OOTrace( @"0x%08x %s", this, "TCONSTRUCT" ); }
00069     ~OOClassTest() { constructed--; OOTrace( @"0x%08x %s", this, "TDESTRUCT" ); }
00070 };
00071 
00072 #import "ObjCppAppDelegate.h"
00073 
00074 @implementation OOTestObjC
00075 
00076 static int _alloced;
00077 
00078 - init {
00079     if ( self = [super init] ) {
00080         _alloced++;
00081     }
00082     return self;
00083 }
00084 
00085 - (void)dealloc {
00086     _alloced--;
00087     [super dealloc];
00088 }
00089 
00090 @end
00091 
00092 @class ChildRecord;
00093 
00094 @interface ParentRecord : OORecord {
00095 @public
00096     OOString ID;
00097     char c;
00098     short s;
00099     int i;
00100     float f;
00101     double d;
00102 }
00103 - (OOArray<ChildRecord *>)children;
00104 @end
00105 
00106 @interface ChildRecord : OORecord {
00107 @public
00108     OOString ID;
00109     OOStringArray strs; 
00110 }
00111 @end
00112 
00113 static int rcount, awoke;
00114 
00115 @implementation ParentRecord
00116 
00117 + (NSString *)ooTableName { return @"PARENT_TABLE"; };
00118 + (NSString *)ooTableKey { return @"ID"; }
00119 
00120 - init { rcount++; return [super init]; };
00121 - (OOArray<ChildRecord *>)children {
00122     return [ChildRecord selectRecordsRelatedTo:self];
00123 }
00124 - (void)dealloc { rcount--; return [super dealloc]; }
00125 
00126 @end
00127 
00128 @implementation ChildRecord
00129 
00130 + (NSString *)ooTableName { return @"CHILD_TABLE"; };
00131 
00132 - init { rcount++; return [super init]; };
00133 - (void)awakeFromDB { awoke++; }
00134 
00135 - (OOReference<ParentRecord *>)parent {
00136     return *[ParentRecord selectRecordsRelatedTo:self][0];
00137 }
00138 
00139 - (void)dealloc { rcount--; return [super dealloc]; }
00140 
00141 @end

00158 - (void)applicationDidFinishLaunching:(NSNotification *)aNotification {
00159     BOOL allTests = TRUE;
00160     
00161     NSLog( @"Starting tests" );
00162 
00163     // basic references
00164     if ( allTests ) {
00165         OOTestObjC *obj = [[OOTestObjC alloc] init];
00166         assert( _alloced == 1 );
00167 
00168         OOExpect( "INIT RETAIN" );
00169         OOReference<OOTestObjC *> autoRef = obj;
00170         assert( _objcpp.retained == 1 );
00171         [obj release];
00172         assert( _alloced == 1 );
00173         
00174         OOExpect( "RETAIN" );
00175         ivarRef = autoRef;
00176         assert( _objcpp.retained == 2 );
00177 
00178         OOExpect( "DESTUCT RELEASE" );
00179     }
00180     assert( _objcpp.retained == 1 );
00181     assert( _alloced == 1 );
00182     
00183     OOExpect( "INIT RETAIN DESTUCT RELEASE DESTUCT RELEASE" );
00184     ~ivarRef;
00185     OOExpect( NULL );
00186 
00187     assert( _objcpp.retained == 0 );
00188     assert( _alloced == 0 );
00189 
00190     // array references 
00191     if ( allTests ) {
00192         {
00193             OOExpect( "INIT" );
00194             OOArray<OOTestObjC *> autoArray;
00195 
00196             for ( int i=0 ; i<10 ; i++ ) {
00197                 OOTestObjC *obj = [[OOTestObjC alloc] init];
00198                 
00199                 if ( i==0 ) OOExpect("ALLOC RETAIN");
00200                 autoArray[i] = obj;
00201                 [obj release];
00202             }
00203             assert( _objcpp.retained == 1 );
00204             assert( _alloced == 10 );
00205 
00206             OOExpect( "RETAIN" );
00207             ivarArray = autoArray;
00208             assert( _objcpp.retained == 2 );
00209 
00210             OOExpect( "DESTUCT RELEASE" );
00211         }
00212         assert( _objcpp.retained == 1 );
00213         {
00214             OOExpect( "INIT RETAIN" );
00215             OOArray<OOTestObjC *> autoArray = ivarArray;
00216             assert( _objcpp.retained == 2 );
00217             assert( _alloced == 10 );
00218 
00219             OOExpect( "DESTUCT RELEASE" );
00220         }
00221     }
00222     assert( _objcpp.retained == 1 );
00223     assert( _alloced == 10 );
00224 
00225     OOExpect( "RELEASE" );
00226     ivarArray = nil;
00227     assert( _objcpp.retained == 0 );
00228     assert( _alloced == 0 );

00298 
00299         assert( str != str2 );
00300         assert( str == str3 );

00530     // string operators
00531     if ( allTests ) {
00532         OOString str;
00533         str <<= @"Hello World";
00534         assert( str[1] == 'e' );
00535         str[1] = 'a';
00536         assert( str[1] != 'e' );
00537         str[@"o"] = @"aa";
00538         OOString str2 = @"Hallaa Waarld";
00539         assert( str == str2 );
00540         OOString l = @"l";
00541         NSString *s = l;
00542         str <<= str - l;
00543         str <<= str - s;
00544         str <<= str - "l";
00545         str += ";;";
00546         str2 = @"Haaa Waard;;";
00547         assert( str == str2 );
00548         str <<= @"";
00549         OOStringArray a(0);
00550         assert( !a );
00551         OOStringArray b(nil);
00552         assert( !b );
00553         OOStringArray c(OONil);
00554         assert( !c );
00555         assert( (int)a==0 );
00556     
00557         OOArray<NSString *> stringArray;
00558         stringArray[0] = @"ONE";
00559         stringArray[1] = @"TWO";
00560         
00561         OODictionary<NSString *> stringDict;
00562         stringDict[@"KEY1"] = @"STRING1";
00563         stringDict[@"KEY2"][@"SUBKEY1"] = @"STRING2";
00564         str <<= @"Hello World";
00565         if ( str[1] == 'e' )
00566             str[1] = 'a';
00567         str = str + @"!";
00568         str += @"!";
00569         if ( str != (OOString)@"Hallo World!!" )
00570             assert(0);
00571     }

00576         NSString *s1 = str;
00577         NSMutableString *s2 = str;
00578         OOStringArray a1 = (const char *)str, a2 = "C B A";
00579         assert( a1 != a2 );
00580         // reverse sort
00581         a1 = -+a1;
00582         assert( a1 == a2 );
00583         ~a1[1];
00584         assert( a1 != a2 );
00585         ~a2[-2];
00586         assert( a1 == a2 );
00587         OOArray<OOString> a3 = a2;
00588         assert( a1 == a3 );
00589         NSArray *a = a2;
00590         NSMutableArray *m = a2;
00591         assert( a1 == a );
00592         assert( a1 == m );
00593         assert( (int)a1 == 2 );
00594         a1 += a;
00595         assert( (int)a1 == 4 );
00596         a1 += m;
00597         assert( (int)a1 == 6 );
00598         a1 += str;
00599         assert( (int)a1 == 7 );
00600         a1 += s1;
00601         assert( (int)a1 == 8 );
00602         a1 += s2;
00603         assert( (int)a1 == 9 );
00604         a1 += "1 2 3";
00605         assert( (int)a1 == 10 );
00606         a1 -= a2;
00607         ~a1[str];
00608         assert( (int)a1 == 3 );
00609         a1 -= s1;
00610         assert( (int)a1 == 1 );
00611         a1 = a;
00612         a1 = m;
00613     }
00614     
00615     // set operators
00616     if ( allTests ) {
00617         OOStringArray a1 = "A B C", a2 = "C D E", a3 = "C", a4 = "A B C D E", a5 = kCFNull;
00618         assert( (a1 & a2) == a3 );
00619         assert( (a1 | a2) == a4 );
00620         a1 -= 1;
00621         a1 -= OOString(@"A");
00622         assert( a1 == OOStrArray( "C" ) );
00623         OOStringDict aa = OONil;
00624         assert( !aa );
00625         OOStringArray bb = nil;
00626         assert( !bb );
00627         OOObjects<NSObject *> m, n=m;
00628         OOStrings p, q=p;
00629         
00630         OOStringDict a = "a 1 b 2", b = "b 3 c 4";
00631         assert( +OOStringArray( a & b ) == "2 b" );
00632         assert( +OOStringArray( a | b ) == "1 2 4 a b c" );
00633         assert( +OOStringArray( b | a ) == "1 3 4 a b c" );
00634     }

00641         assert( a1 == OOStrArray( "A B C D E" ) );  
00642         assert( a1+a1 == OOStrArray( "A B C D E" )*2 );
00643         if ( 0 ) {
00644             NSString *s = nil;
00645             NSMutableString *m = nil;
00646             NSArray *aa = nil;
00647             NSMutableArray *ma = nil;
00648             OOString os, o1 = s, o2 = m, o3 = os;
00649             OOStringArray oa, sa1 = aa, sa2 = ma, sa3 = oa;
00650             os = nil; os = s; os = m;
00651             aa = nil; oa = aa; oa = ma; 
00652             OOArray<OOString> as, s1 = aa, s2 = ma, s3 = aa, s4 = as;
00653             OODictionary<OOString> ds;
00654             as = nil;
00655             ds = nil;
00656         }
00657     }

00664         assert( ref == in );
00665         ref = *arr;
00666         assert( ref == in );
00667         assert( [ref retainCount] == 2 );
00668         ref = &~arr; // [[*arr retain] autorelease]; //
00669         assert( ref == in );
00670         assert( [ref retainCount] == 2 );

00997     if ( allTests ) {
00998         assert( (OOStr("a123 b123 B345")|@"/([ab])(\\d+)/$1=$2/i") == OOStr("a=123 b=123 B=345") );
00999         assert( OOStringArray( @"a", @"b", @"c", nil ) == (OOStr( "----a----b--c----") & "\\w+") );
01000         assert( OOStringArray( @"a", @"b", @"c", nil ) == (OOStr( "----a----b--c----") & "\\w+") );
01001         assert( OOStringArray( @"a", @"b", @"c", nil ) == (OOStr( "----a----b--c----") & "\\w+") );
01002         assert( OOStringArray( @"a", @"b", @"c", nil ) == (OOStr( "----a----b--c----") & "\\w+") );
01003         assert( OOStringArray( @"", @"a", @"b", @"c", @"", nil ) == (OOPattern( "-+" ).split( "-----a----b--c----")));
01004         assert( OOStringArray( @"a", @"b", @"c", nil ) == *(OOStr( "----a----b--c----") ^ "\\W+(\\w+)\\W+(\\w+)\\W+(\\w+)\\W+")[NSMakeRange(1,3)] );
01005         OOStringArray p = OOStr( "123abc" )^"(\\d+)(\\w+)(===)?";
01006         assert( !!p[2] );
01007         assert( *p[2] );
01008         assert( !p[3] );
01009         assert( !*p[3] );
01010         assert( !**p[3] );

01130     // objsql tests
01131     if ( allTests ) {
01132         [OODatabase exec:"drop table if exists PARENT_TABLE"];
01133         [OODatabase exec:"drop table if exists CHILD_TABLE"];
01134 
01135         // populate parent a child records
01136         for ( int i=0 ; i<10 ; i++ ) {
01137             ParentRecord *p = [[ParentRecord alloc] init];
01138             p->ID = OOString("ID")+i;
01139             p->c = 123*i;
01140             p->s = 234*i;
01141             p->i = 345*i;
01142             p->f = 456.*i;
01143             p->d = 567.*i;
01144             [[p insert] release];
01145             for ( int j=0 ; j<i ; j++ ) {
01146                 ChildRecord *c = [ChildRecord insertWithParent:p];
01147                 for ( int k=0 ; k<2 ; k++ )
01148                     c->strs += c->ID;
01149             }
01150             assert( [OODatabase commitTransaction] == 1+i );
01151         }
01152 
01153         // select using a record as a filter
01154         ParentRecord *filter = [ParentRecord record];
01155         filter->ID = "ID5";
01156         
01157         OOArray<ParentRecord *> sel1 = [filter select];
01158         assert( (int)sel1 == 1 );
01159         //OOPrint( sel1 );
01160         
01161         // test to-many relationship - "*" is required ///
01162         OOArray<ChildRecord *> sel2 = [*sel1[0] children];
01163         assert( (int)sel2 == 5 );
01164         assert( awoke == 5 );
01165 
01166         // check archived field
01167         ChildRecord *child = sel2[2];
01168         assert( child->strs == "ID5 ID5" );
01169         assert( [child parent]->ID == "ID5" );
01170         
01171         // test LIKE expression
01172         filter->ID = "ID%";
01173         sel1.fetch( filter, nil );
01174         assert( (int)sel1 == 10 );
01175     }
01176     assert( rcount == 1 ); // filter is autoreleased

01179     if ( allTests ) {
01180         assert( OOURL( "http://www.google.com" ).string() & "oogle" );
01181         OOString translate = OOURL( "http://translate.google.com/translate_t" ).post( "hl=en&ie=UTF-8&text=Hello&sl=en&tl=fr" );
01182         assert( translate & "Bonjour" );
01183         OOString inverse = OOURL( "http://translate.google.com/translate_t" ).post( "hl=en&ie=UTF-8&text=&sl=ja&tl=en" );
01184         assert( inverse & "Hi" );
01185     }
